page.title: 17A New Water Main-Kinoulton
page.content: In the past six months there have been a lot of traffic problems in Kinoulton because workmen from the {Severn-Trent Water Authoriy}have been digging up the roads to lay a{new {water main.}The old pipes have become corroded as they were made of{cast {iron.}The new pipes are made of{Medium {Density Polyethylene}and are expected to last about 60 years. The roadworks have caused many difficulties as cars, buses,etc. have had to squeeze up to the side of the road, sometimes causing damage to the vehicles. Since the roadworks began our school bus has had to go to Upper Broughton first and then to Hickling, instead of the other way round.In this way the bus could avoid passing where the men were working.
